chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
V: NormedModule R_AbsRing
f: R -> V
s: SF_seq

Goal:
SF_sorted Rle s -> let a := SF_h s in let b := last (SF_h s) (unzip1 (SF_t s)) in is_RInt (SF_fun (SF_map f s) zero) a b (Riemann_sum f s)

Premises:
last = fun T : Type => fix last (x : T) (s : seq T) {struct s} : T := match s with | [::] => x | x' :: s' => last x' s' end : forall T : Type, T -> seq T -> T Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _ seq_scope]
Riemann_sum = fun (V : ModuleSpace R_Ring) (f : R -> V) (ptd : SF_seq) => foldr plus zero (pairmap (fun x y : R * R => scal (fst y - fst x) (f (snd y))) (SF_h ptd, zero) (SF_t ptd)) : forall V : ModuleSpace R_Ring, (R -> V) -> SF_seq -> V Argument V is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [_ function_scope _]
SF_h = fun (T : Type) (s : SF_seq) => let (SF_h, _) := s in SF_h : forall T : Type, SF_seq -> R Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _]
SF_sorted = fun (T : Type) (Ord : R -> R -> Prop) (s : SF_seq) => sorted Ord (SF_lx s) : forall T : Type, (R -> R -> Prop) -> SF_seq -> Prop Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope _]
zero = fun G : AbelianGroup => AbelianGroup.zero G (AbelianGroup.class G) : forall G : AbelianGroup, G Argument G is implicit and maximally inserted
Notation NormedModule := NormedModule.type
SF_t = fun (T : Type) (s : SF_seq) => let (_, SF_t) := s in SF_t : forall T : Type, SF_seq -> seq (R * T) Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _]
SF_fun = fun (T : Type) (s : SF_seq) (y0 : T) (x : R) => SF_fun_aux (SF_h s, y0) (SF_t s) y0 x : forall T : Type, SF_seq -> T -> R -> T Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _ R_scope]
unzip1 = fun S T : Type => map fst : forall S T : Type, seq (S * T) -> seq S Arguments S, T are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope type_scope seq_scope]
Rle = fun r1 r2 : R => r1 < r2 \/ r1 = r2 : R -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [R_scope R_scope]
is_RInt = fun (V : NormedModule R_AbsRing) (f : R -> V) (a b : R) (If : V) => filterlim (fun ptd : SF_seq => scal (sign (b - a)) (Riemann_sum f ptd)) (Riemann_fine a b) (locally If) : forall V : NormedModule R_AbsRing, (R -> V) -> R -> R -> V -> Prop Argument V is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [_ function_scope R_scope R_scope _]
SF_map = fun (T T0 : Type) (f : T -> T0) (s : SF_seq) => {| SF_h := SF_h s; SF_t := [seq (fst x, f (snd x)) | x <- SF_t s] |} : forall T T0 : Type, (T -> T0) -> SF_seq -> SF_seq Arguments T, T0 are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope type_scope function_scope _]
*** [ R : Set ]
Riemann_sum_compat : forall (f : R -> R_ModuleSpace) (s : SF_seq) (pr : SF_sorted Rle s), Riemann_sum f s = RiemannInt_SF (SF_compat_le (SF_map f s) (SF_map_sort f s Rle pr))
SF_behead = fun (T : Type) (s : SF_seq) => {| SF_h := head (SF_h s) (unzip1 (SF_t s)); SF_t := behead (SF_t s) |} : forall T : Type, SF_seq -> SF_seq Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _]
BinIntDef.Z.quotrem = fun a b : Z => match a with | 0%Z => (0%Z, 0%Z) | Z.pos a0 => match b with | 0%Z => (0%Z, a) | Z.pos b0 => let (q, r) := N.pos_div_eucl a0 (N.pos b0) in (BinIntDef.Z.of_N q, BinIntDef.Z.of_N r) | Z.neg b0 => let (q, r) := N.pos_div_eucl a0 (N.pos b0) in ((- BinIntDef.Z.of_N q)%Z, BinIntDef.Z.of_N r) end | Z.neg a0 => match b with | 0%Z => (0%Z, a) | Z.pos b0 => let (q, r) := N.pos_div_eucl a0 (N.pos b0) in ((- BinIntDef.Z.of_N q)%Z, (- BinIntDef.Z.of_N r)%Z) | Z...
SF_cut_up = fun (sf : SF_seq) (x : R) => let s := seq_cut_up ((SF_h sf, SF_h sf) :: SF_t sf) x in {| SF_h := fst (head (SF_h sf, SF_h sf) s); SF_t := behead s |} : SF_seq -> R -> SF_seq Argument scopes are [_ R_scope]
SF_cut_down = fun (sf : SF_seq) (x : R) => let s := seq_cut_down ((SF_h sf, SF_h sf) :: SF_t sf) x in {| SF_h := fst (head (SF_h sf, SF_h sf) s); SF_t := behead s |} : SF_seq -> R -> SF_seq Argument scopes are [_ R_scope]
AbsRing.Ring = fun cT : AbsRing => let xT := let '{| AbsRing.sort := T |} := cT in T in Ring.Pack cT (AbsRing.class cT : AbsRing.class_of xT) xT : AbsRing -> Ring AbsRing.Ring is a coercion
Ring.AbelianGroup = fun cT : Ring => let xT := let '{| Ring.sort := T |} := cT in T in AbelianGroup.Pack cT (Ring.class cT : Ring.class_of xT) xT : Ring -> AbelianGroup Ring.AbelianGroup is a coercion
is_RInt_scal : forall (f0 : R -> ?V) (a b k : R) (If : ?V), is_RInt f0 a b If -> is_RInt (fun y : R => scal k (f0 y)) a b (scal k If) where ?V : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V s : SF_seq |- NormedModule R_AbsRing]
is_RInt_comp_lin : forall (f0 : R -> ?V) (u v a b : R) (l : ?V), is_RInt f0 (u * a + v) (u * b + v) l -> is_RInt (fun y : R => scal u (f0 (u * y + v))) a b l where ?V : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V s : SF_seq |- NormedModule R_AbsRing]
SF_Chasles : forall (f0 : R -> ?V) (s0 : SF_seq) (x x0 : R), SF_h s0 <= x <= last (SF_h s0) (unzip1 (SF_t s0)) -> Riemann_sum f0 s0 = plus (Riemann_sum f0 (SF_cut_down' s0 x x0)) (Riemann_sum f0 (SF_cut_up' s0 x x0)) where ?V : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V s : SF_seq |- ModuleSpace R_AbsRing]
ad_SF_compat : forall (z0 : R) (s : SF_seq), SF_sorted Rle s -> adapted_couple (SF_fun s z0) (head 0 (SF_lx s)) (last 0 (SF_lx s)) (seq2Rlist (SF_lx s)) (seq2Rlist (SF_ly s))
SF_cut_down' = fun (sf : SF_seq) (x x0 : R) => let s := seq_cut_down' ((SF_h sf, x0) :: SF_t sf) x x0 in {| SF_h := fst (head (SF_h sf, x0) s); SF_t := behead s |} : SF_seq -> R -> R -> SF_seq Argument scopes are [_ R_scope R_scope]
SF_cut_up' = fun (sf : SF_seq) (x x0 : R) => let s := seq_cut_up' ((SF_h sf, x0) :: SF_t sf) x x0 in {| SF_h := fst (head (SF_h sf, x0) s); SF_t := behead s |} : SF_seq -> R -> R -> SF_seq Argument scopes are [_ R_scope R_scope]
pos = fun p : posreal => let (pos, _) := p in pos : posreal -> R pos is a coercion
Ring.sort = fun t : Ring => let (sort, _, _) := t in sort : Ring -> Type Ring.sort is a coercion
UniformSpace.sort = fun t : UniformSpace => let (sort, _, _) := t in sort : UniformSpace -> Type UniformSpace.sort is a coercion
AbelianGroup.sort = fun t : AbelianGroup => let (sort, _, _) := t in sort : AbelianGroup -> Type AbelianGroup.sort is a coercion
Riemann_sum_zero : forall (f0 : R -> ?V) (ptd : SF_seq), SF_sorted Rle ptd -> SF_h ptd = last (SF_h ptd) (SF_lx ptd) -> Riemann_sum f0 ptd = zero where ?V : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V s : SF_seq |- ModuleSpace R_Ring]
Riemann_fine = fun a b : R => within (fun ptd : SF_seq => pointed_subdiv ptd /\ SF_h ptd = Rmin a b /\ last (SF_h ptd) (SF_lx ptd) = Rmax a b) (locally_dist (fun ptd : SF_seq => seq_step (SF_lx ptd))) : R -> R -> (SF_seq -> Prop) -> Prop Argument scopes are [R_scope R_scope function_scope]
is_RInt_comp_opp : forall (f0 : R -> ?V) (a b : R) (l : ?V), is_RInt f0 (- a) (- b) l -> is_RInt (fun y : R => opp (f0 (- y))) a b l where ?V : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V s : SF_seq |- NormedModule R_AbsRing]
is_RInt_const : forall (a b : R) (v : ?V), is_RInt (fun _ : R => v) a b (scal (b - a) v) where ?V : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V s : SF_seq |- NormedModule R_AbsRing]
SF_compat_le : forall s : SF_seq, SF_sorted Rle s -> StepFun (head 0 (SF_lx s)) (last 0 (SF_lx s))
is_RInt_point : forall (f0 : R -> ?V) (a : R), is_RInt f0 a a zero where ?V : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V s : SF_seq |- NormedModule R_AbsRing]
Riemann_sum_Chasles_0 : forall (f0 : R -> ?V) (M x : R) (ptd : SF_seq) (eps : posreal), (forall x0 : R, SF_h ptd <= x0 <= last (SF_h ptd) (SF_lx ptd) -> norm (f0 x0) < M) -> SF_h ptd <= x <= last (SF_h ptd) (SF_lx ptd) -> pointed_subdiv ptd -> seq_step (SF_lx ptd) < eps -> norm (minus (plus (Riemann_sum f0 (SF_cut_down ptd x)) (Riemann_sum f0 (SF_cut_up ptd x))) (Riemann_sum f0 ptd)) < 2 * eps * M where ?V : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V s : SF_seq |- NormedModule R_AbsRing]
mkStepFun : forall (a b : R) (fe : R -> R), IsStepFun fe a b -> StepFun a b
SF_rcons = fun (T : Type) (s : SF_seq) (t : R * T) => {| SF_h := SF_h s; SF_t := rcons (SF_t s) t |} : forall T : Type, SF_seq -> R * T -> SF_seq Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _]
RiemannInt_SF : forall a b : R, StepFun a b -> R
SF_map_sort : forall (f0 : ?T -> ?T0) (s0 : SF_seq) (Ord : R -> R -> Prop), SF_sorted Ord s0 -> SF_sorted Ord (SF_map f0 s0) where ?T : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V s : SF_seq |- Type] ?T0 : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V s : SF_seq |- Type]
subdivision : forall a b : R, StepFun a b -> Rlist
subdivision_val : forall a b : R, StepFun a b -> Rlist
Rlt_div_r : forall a b c : R, c > 0 -> a * c < b < -> a < b / c
Riemann_sum_norm : forall (f0 : R -> ?V) (g : R -> R) (ptd : SF_seq), pointed_subdiv ptd -> (forall t : R, SF_h ptd <= t <= last (SF_h ptd) (SF_lx ptd) -> norm (f0 t) <= g t) -> norm (Riemann_sum f0 ptd) <= Riemann_sum g ptd where ?V : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V s : SF_seq |- NormedModule R_AbsRing]
open_interval = fun a b x : R => a < x < b : R -> R -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [R_scope R_scope R_scope]
SF_lx = fun (T : Type) (s : SF_seq) => SF_h s :: unzip1 (SF_t s) : forall T : Type, SF_seq -> seq R Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _]
SF_fun_map : forall (f0 : ?T -> ?T0) (s0 : SF_seq) (y0 : ?T) (x : R), SF_fun (SF_map f0 s0) (f0 y0) x = f0 (SF_fun s0 y0 x) where ?T : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V s : SF_seq |- Type] ?T0 : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V s : SF_seq |- Type]
Rmult_max_distr_l : forall a b c : R, 0 <= a -> a * Rmax b c = Rmax (a * b) (a * c)
Rmult_min_distr_l : forall a b c : R, 0 <= a -> a * Rmin b c = Rmin (a * b) (a * c)
Riemann_sum_scal : forall (a : R) (f0 : R -> ?V) (ptd : SF_seq), Riemann_sum (fun x : R => scal a (f0 x)) ptd = scal a (Riemann_sum f0 ptd) where ?V : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V s : SF_seq |- ModuleSpace R_Ring]
is_subdivision = fun (f : R -> R) (a b : R) (l : Rlist) => {l0 : Rlist & adapted_couple f a b l l0} : (R -> R) -> R -> R -> Rlist -> Type Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope _]
Rminus_le_0 : forall a b : R, a <= b < -> 0 <= b - a

```coq
intros V f s Hsorted a b.
unfold is_RInt. apply filterlim_snd. intros eps Heps.
unfold Rminus. rewrite Ropp_minus_distr. rewrite Rabs_Ropp.
pose proof (Riemann_sum_Chasles_0 f (Rmin a b) (Rmax a b) s eps) as H0.
assert (H1: SF_h s <= Rmin a b <= Rmax a b <= last (SF_h s) (unzip1 (SF_t s))).
{ split; try apply Rmin_l; try apply Rmin_r; try apply Rmax_l; try apply Rmax_r. }
apply H0; auto. clear H0.
intros x Hx. apply Rabs_def2.
apply Rle_trans with (Rabs (scal (sign (b - a)) (Riemann_sum f s))).
apply RRle_abs.
apply Heps.
Qed.
Qed.```

original: intros V f s Hsorted a b. unfold is_RInt. apply filterlim_snd. intros eps Heps. unfold Rminus. rewrite Ropp_minus_distr. rewrite Rabs_Ropp. pose proof (Riemann_sum_Chasles_0 f (Rmin a b) (Rmax a b) s eps) as H0. assert (H1: SF_h s <= Rmin a b <= Rmax a b <= last (SF_h s) (unzip1 (SF_t s))). { split; try apply Rmin_l; try apply Rmin_r; try apply Rmax_l; try apply Rmax_r. } apply H0; auto. clear H0. intros x Hx. apply Rabs_def2. apply Rle_trans with (Rabs (scal (sign (b - a)) (Riemann_sum f s))). apply RRle_abs. apply Heps.
